title: Obari
author: Obari
content: Its another 365 days circle rotation and I personally Â don't place so much emphasis on celebrating birthdays but this year I felt the need to because its been more than half a year I joined the forum and today its my birthday and not just my birthday but I'm also expected to rank up to the senior member rank today if the pick is done earlier and I couldn't Â hold my joy and had to share with house.I'm hoping to make a post in the rank up announcement Â thread so I want to plead that if this isn't the right board to post this, that it should Â be moved to Nigeria local board but leaving it here will be better.I hope you all joined me share in my joy.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: You can post it on the reputation board, but not as a new thread, but on a thread that has been existing before. This is where you supposed to post it:Announce your rank up, merit or any achievements that makes you feel great!You can copy the opening post on this thread and the title, post it in that existing thread and lock this thread.

comments.author: LDL
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on May 17, 2023, 08:12:08 AMIts another 365 days circle rotation and I personally Â don't place so much emphasis on celebrating birthdays but this year I felt the need to because its been more than half a year I joined the forum and today its my birthday and not just my birthday but I'm also expected to rank up to the senior member rank today if the pick is done earlier and I couldn't Â hold my joy and had to share with house.I'm hoping to make a post in the rank up announcement Â thread so I want to plead that if this isn't the right board to post this, that it should Â be moved to Nigeria local board but leaving it here will be better.I hope you all joined me share in my joy.Best wishes and best wishes from Bitcoin Forum as you achieve your much desired new rank of Senior Member today. The joy of getting a new rank in you is evident from your advance post. I wish that the intense joy that you have in you will continue throughout your life. Hope you will spend your precious time in bitcoin forum and participate in the welfare of the forum. Finally I wish you all development and good health and I wish good health and well being to every member of your family.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: Happy birthday to you, mate! Being 1945 years old is a featÂ   Lol.Congratulations on ranking up as well. What a birthday treat. Good job on being here, and more contributions to come!

comments.author: moijiashiasei
comments.created_time: May 17, 2023, 09:35:47 AMLast edit: May 24, 2023, 11:45:50 AM by moijiashiasei
comments.body: At least you can have the whole cake to yourself.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Thank you so much for all those who took their time to wish me well.You will never lack amen.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Happy Birthday!!!Bless you and I wish you a happy life.

comments.body: birthday blessings with good and sound health, more blessings and remember to do some merit giveaways to we newbeis

comments.body: Happy birthday even though it's too late to say ðŸ˜…. But, I wish you success and good health for you.

comments.body: Happy birthday buddy. Have a good one.

comments.author: MR~
comments.body: Happy birthday to you Many many happy returns of the day.

comments.author: sysoe
comments.body: Happy birthday to you! You have achieved a lot in the past year, both on the forum and in your life. I hope you enjoy your day and celebrate your accomplishments. You deserve it!
